comments:
Description:
NPE throws out when selecting multiple datasets.

Build number: 2.3.0.v20071127-1036

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a report
2, New a datasource and multiple datasets
3, Select two datasets at the same time

Expected result:
No exception occurs

Actual result:
NPE Occurs

Error log:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.attributes.widget.TextPropertyDescriptor.load(TextPropertyDescriptor.java:128)
